content.detailedDescription: i was working at avondale shipyard and myself and a friend were standing outside on a break. the weather was clear light blue sky, you could see forever. we were talking about the job and we notice a jet way up about 20,00ft. heading south/east, you could tell it was a jet. from the opposite direction we notice what we thought was another jet heading right at it. they were about 5 miles apart when we first saw them. it looked like they were going about the same speed. when they got about the length of 10 jets apart the second jet made a 45 degree turn to the right and shot out of site. we both looked at each other and new right away it was a ufo. the turning object had to be going 3-times the speed after the turn. after that day i new for sure that they are real ufos.
content.summary: Was looking at a jet with small con trail. a object another jet i thought  was heading right at it.

content.detailedDescription: Stopped on side of highway to cool truck after climbing steep pass on i-15 which was a two lane road in 1973. saw bright light on ground across road. thought it would be an rv.  walked across highway to see if i could get water for truck. realized light was from the sky. looked up, saw triangle shaped craft with light coming from it. ran back to truck, very frightened. started driving towards next town. had telepathic communication that told me not to be afraid.  fear immediately left, sense of calm and excitement, both physical and emotional occurred.  drove into small town of mesquite, on utah-nevada border. pulled young kids who were working at the all night gas station out into parking lot and showed them the light. they said they saw them all the time, they were not interested in it, they'd been seeing these for years.  too common, no big deal.  went to all night cafe, stopped people in parking lot and they watched it as well. light would move from left to right across the sky then back again in seconds. then it would come down towards us and take on a triangular shape as it got closer. then it would shoot up until it was just a bright light. really felt like it was communicating with us, showing off, making sure we saw it. then we watched it go directly up and out of view. years later i realize the time did not match the events. saw light about 1130 pm, it left about 0230 am, only have events for about an hour and a half. have had one other experience while camping alone in washington state.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw ufo with light shining on ground, watched for several hours.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning from missoula one friday evening, driving along a secondary highway toward dillon, mt. as i was coming around a corner near mill point (approx. 24 miles from dillon) i slowed down as there was a flatbed pickup stalled in the right lane of the highway. as i went around the vehicle, the door was open and i recognized the name "selkirk hereford ranch" stenciled on the door. there was no one in the vehicle. just as i got around the vehicle, something caught my eye to the left at about 45 degrees. there was a large fireball/flash/sparks descending over the ridge and apparently coming to rest behind the mill point. i was so frightened, instead of looking back behind the landform as i drove past, i accelerated and never stopped to look back. at that time, if you saw an event like that and lived in a small town, you kept it to yourself. i did share the event with one person, a trusted employee of my dad's. where this could get interesting is, by monday, there had been numerous reports to the sheriff's office of similar sightings. the local radio station, kdbm, suprisingly broadcast news regarding these sightings. one extraordinary report indicated a woman was persued by a firey object thate hovered over her car and scorched the hood.
  i'm a professional archaeologist with considerable credibility and am known for being pretty open minded. i have been watching the history channel and there seems to be many documented, proven ufo events being brought forward with greater intensity/evidence than ever before. that is why i am now coming forward with this.
content.summary: Huge flame/fireball descending to the north of a vehicle adandoned in middle of highway.

content.detailedDescription: This event was recorded in the wahpeton nd daily news, newspaper.  my mother and father were out visiting in hankinson nd, traveling back to wahpeton nd, they told me a light very bright lit up an area around the car, stopping it. my mother wanted my father to get out of the car and look up, to see where the light was coming from.  my father refused.  the light went out and car started after a little while. they watched the object travel out of sight very slowly, with no sound.  several officers of the law followed the lights. i believe they tracked the object from hankinson nd to fairmount nd to near wahpeton nd.  this story should be in the archives of the daily news.  i only know my father never told any one about the event which he thought would make people think they (my parents) were crazy.  it's been so long since this event took place, i belive it was in the early 70's.
content.summary: Stopped my parents car, chased by local police.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my friends house outside smoking a cigarette.  i looked up and noticed this really really bright light.I honestly didnt think it could be anything i knew about, it was not moving, it stayed in the same spot for a couple of hours. if i was looking at the light i could see airplanes in my field of vision, so i know it wasnt a plane. it wasnt that high up in the sky either. i have seen this light for about the last 2 months
in different parts of the sky above my town columbia missouri. there are about 80,000 people in this town so its fairly large.  i have seen this light about 8-10 times, and am actually used to it. usually there is the really really bright yellowish orange light and a smaller yellow light at either 10 o clock or 6 o clock about 6 inches above it, or below it. on the 24th of dec 2008 i observed only the large yellowish orange light.  the first time i saw it i kept waiting for it to fly over, as it seemed it would have to. but it always stays stationary.  after seeing it the first time, i looked  online to see if anyone had reported anything over columbia missouri. there were 3 reports describing what i saw, however one of the witnesses said he saw the light zoom off.  i havent had the chance to see that yet, it is winter and freezing so i can usually stay outside for a half hour max. when i see these lights in the sky i get excited and, this is silly but i try to project positive thoughts to it them, friendly vibes.
but i always end up angry at the fact that we are sooooooo in the dark about life from other planets, i also wonder what they are doing, or if it is alien technology reverse engineered by the usaf.  but overall i am excited and hope there is a great change taking place in my lifetime.
content.summary: It was a very very bright yellowish orange light.

content.detailedDescription: it was in the summer of july, we didn't have air condition we used a window fan at nite to circulate air thru the house,the fan sometimes would get off balance and would vibrate very loud and i would get up and shake it one way or another to make it stop, and that nite in july 1977 it started viberating very loud so i got up to stop it from making  the noise i looked up and there was a disc shaped object sitting dead still in the air above my father inlaws house just above the trees, i watched for about 30 minutes or so and then about that time my fatherinlaw drove up he had been at the vfw playing pocker, he got out of his car and he saw this disc first thing he did was grab his heart, the thing sceared  him to death so he started for the back door of his house and keep looking up at this disc, well i watched for awhile longer and finaly layed back down, but could not sleep so i got back up and the disc was gone,the next day when i got home from work i went up to my father inlaws house and said paul what was that out there last nite, he was shocked to know that i also seen it, he said he thought he was loosing his mind, but  i said no i seen it my self and watched it for a long time.It was kinda yellowish looking color and about 50x50 round.And kinda glowed.
content.summary: Saucer shaped object  hovered above tree tops.

content.detailedDescription:
Number of witnesses 5
number of objects 1
object shape sphere
object lights / color / brightness blue white light
object motion / behavior flew up in the air then was flying on circles like crazy then it disapeared 
object (angular) size look like a comet
distance to object far up in the sky 
angle of observation north facing south
weather conditions cold 

i was at my in laws in the back yard having a smoked ham with 4 other witnesses when some weird light went up in the sky thought it was fireworks but then it blew up like fireworks small explosion but then it started flying in circles and flying like no airplane no sound totally silent then it flew down and it disappeared. we were intruiged wondering what it was .
content.summary: Sphere ufo over arlington.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from an errand, i pulled into the driveway, got out of my vehicle, looked up at the mountains to the north of where i was standing and saw what i thought was a helicopter searching the southern face of the mountains.
i went into the house to grab my binoculars, and to tell my nephew to come and check this out. we both went outside and observed the object both with our eyes and with the binoculars. upon detailed inspection of the object we observed it darting around with a swaying light underneath it. it also would disappeaer and reappear at random.
it should be mentioned that the mountains are about 10 miles north of where i observed it, the sky was clear with no clouds.
at the time of this report the object was still visible, and the distance it would travel, and the speed in which it was travelling would suggest that it wasn't a helicopter.
content.summary: Small object, darting around, with swaying light underneath, disapearing and reappearing.

content.detailedDescription: on monday december 22 i was watching tv around 10-11 at night with my brother. something caught my attention outside, so i took galnce at my field behind me. i saw a bright ball falling to the ground. i jumped up and told my brother to look outside. i thought someone shot a firework into our field.(and no there is no neighbors around just woods) the bright ball had a little bit of an arch to it but it disapeared and there were no signs of a ground impact. i didnt think much of it until december 26 12:16 when my friend was waiting for me outside to leave. he came back in, and described the exact same thing i saw a few days earlier. this was strange because my brother was the only one who knew what i had seen. my friend and i both agreed that the object came very close to the ground and was only a few hundred feet away from the house. it was only around for a few seconds before disappearing.(it was not a fire work!)
content.summary: Neon green light fell from the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was up wrapping presents and watching the television when i was finished i looked out of the window in my bedroom. this window has a great view of the stars looking towards the north. i scanned the sky as i do quite often at night because i am a big fan of the stars so it was very clear last night and good for star watching. i noticed 3 brightly glowing lights in the shape of a line. it was horizontal and the three lights were evenly spaced. the lights "looked" like they belonged to one object not 3. it would have been super huge, bigger then any airplane i have ever seen. these lights just stayed there for awhile. i began looking out at around 4 am, the object(s) remained there in the sky brightly shining until around 4:20 am. i was staring at them for awhile saying to myself and my sleeping husband i have never seen the stars in that shape before. but i had on the past sunday coming from the town of lewisburg in tn. after a cousins church play. it reminded me of that, because i noticed on the drive home at night with a very clear sky three star looking lights vertical in the sky. i was trying to make sure they were not apart of the dippers and they were not. i didnt notice that they were moving i told my husband that night that i had never noticed the stars in that shape before but he isnt into that and he was driving on a country road. okay so back to last night. i had decided to see if these lights were in motion so i lined them up with the treetops a little ways from my home. i went back to the window after laying down for a few minutes and they were no longer at the point i at measured them they had moved on a bit, then i watched a little longer and sat back down then got up again and they had gotten farther away. the once bright lights were now barely visible with the naked eye. you could still tell that the shape was huge and that they were lights. i have no idea what this was but it was strange to me. i live near a little airport and a larger airport in the next city and i see planes and saw planes last night. i didnt see anything go near the object which i began to look for. there were also not alot of planes flying i assume due to it being christmas eve/christmas. i would love to know if anyone else saw this. also the objects seemed to tile or dip on the right side a little more then it was already but it never went vertical while i could see it.
content.summary: Horizontal lights hovering & moving slowly.

content.detailedDescription: At 6:41 i was in my car with my girlfriend leaving augesta tec when we both saw four amber light. the lights appered all at the same time and they got brighter and moved apart from each other and then disappered. then the four lights appered agian and did the same thing agian but in a different part of the ski. i was so shocked i almost crashed so i pulled over and called the sherrif's dept. there was no sound  that i could hear
content.summary: Four bright lights in the ski.

content.detailedDescription: They have a round body with light at the bottom of them and they float over the ground they all come back to my psruch for a long time i know im not nuts
content.summary: I sent email on 24th will i watch rest of tape and there was four of them on it.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 8:30pm my huband and i had just gotten home from work. he started cooking dinner and i was sitting on the couch watching tv. as i sat on the couch i heard and felt a deep rimble from outside, it shook the house a little. i remember thinking to myself, "wow, i hope that plane isn't going to crash into my house..It seems very low." as the rumble faded to the distance my husband's cell phone rang. our friend/neighbor wanted to let us know that he and his stepdad were outside smoking a cigarette, when they noticed in the sky a long object with fast, strobing, white lights. they said then out of nowhere a military jet chased after the object. they said the object took off. as i am getting this information i was debating on whether to throw on some clothes and get in the car and go look. after all it was rather cold out. my husband and i debated for a few minutes and said, what the hell. we jumped in the car and all we grabbed was the binoculars. i mean i really didn't expect to see anything..We aren't that lucky. i guess i was wrong. we drove down the street a couple of blocks to the left. my husband has better eyesight than me so he took control of the binoculars. he spotted of what appeared to be a really bright star however with closer examination through the binoculars, the object was strobing some other colors. then both of us saw it move rapidly from one spot to another. i could not beleive it! i looked at him and he looked at me to make sure we both saw the same thing. we decided to try to find a more secluded area that didn't have cars and street lights (because of glare issues),so we drove across the street to the local high school's field. the whole time fixated on the object. i didn't want to lose it. we get to the school,get out of the car and got a better view of the object. it hovered high in the sky and from what we could see it had red,blue,green,yellow, and white strobing lights. the lights moved so rapidly and even appeared to make some weird formations. i could not believe what we were seeing. is this for real? we continued to watch the object for about 15 min. then i told my husband to run home and grab the camera,the phone, and our neighbor (the one who initially spotted it). i decided i'd stay put and watch. icouldn't take my eyes off of this spectacular thing in the sky. as soon as my husband drove off the lights started to become more intense and more rapid like it was going crazy. it started making crazy shapes and figure eight shapes and big loops and zig zags up and down, across the sky...I absolutely could not believe i was witnessing this incredible light show. it got so intense that i,for a brief second, became a little scared. however, shock and amazement prevailed. it was almost as if "they" knew i was watching them? it sounds weird, but that is exactly what it felt like. when my husband came back i tried to explain to him this incredile light show. i handed him the binoculars, but the lights apparently went back to the normal fast dancing strobes like he saw before. i just could not get him to understand the light show i saw no matter how i tried to describe. the only way i can try to explain it is as if i was at a greatful dead concert times 1000!! and with new shapes! we continued to watch the object a little longer then it began to fade into the cloud cover and to the distance. i forgot we did snap a photo. we went back home to see if the picture showed anything. it was faint, but zooming helped a little. after a little while at home we ran outside to see if it was still there. i couldn't believe it, but it was. this time it had shifted to the right of our house, but still visible from the school. i looked at my husband and said, "do you want to try again?" so we jumped in the car a second time over to the school. i looked through the binoculars, but i could tell it was definately farther away which made it more difficult to see. although i could see the faint strobing. my husband snapped two more pictures and it became apparent that it seemed to be leaving. it sounds strange, but i was actually sad to see it go. i guess i know that i will probably never witness anything like that again. i've always believed we weren't alone. you'd have to be so self-centered to think that we are the only ones who occupy this never ending universe, but i never believed for a million years that i would be lucky enough to even come that close to something from another world. of all places this object could've picked in this word, that night it was right outside my door. i hit the jackpot that night. i will never ever forget that experience as long as i live and am truly greatful that it happened to me.     *we were able to get a couple of pretty good photos with enhancing them the colors were out of this word. i didn't submit the photos because i want it to be mine.*
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blue, red, green, yellow, white fast strobbing and dancing lights which made shapes and patterns. it also changed location after hovering for a while. it eventually faded away into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
About 10 p.M. someone came to our door to ask if we owned property near by. we owned 20 acres. they asked us to search it for a down flying object.
we searched and found nothing on our place.

later as we and dozens of other locals prowled the country roads, talking on c.B. radios the word came to us that the local airports as well as bergstrom afb denied any down aircraft.

early in the morning a friend who worked at the round rock paper tried to gain access to the property, which was a commercial egg prouducing business.  he was met by the military who threatened him with weapons and told him to go away. 

he later told me he saw army trucks leaving the property with tarps over loads.

his name is c. l. [cms - see witness notes for name] i have not spoken to him in decades about this. i believe his is still alive however. 

i realize this is an old event, and lacking in real evidence.  however, i've always wanted to know more about the incident.

i'v seen one other unexplained event.  just a light that crossed the sky, horizontal to the horizon, then made a 90 degree turn and sent straight up.  it happened east of round rock, about 1985 ?  my son and i both saw it,, from different locations.

thank you for your site.

[cms-witness name removed]
content.summary: Army activity on a commercial farm north of round rock.

content.detailedDescription: I was bringing my grandmother to work around 5:50am in the morning like i do every day,but this day was special, while i was driving i noticed a very bright light in the sky, bouncing and moving back and forth, i knew this was not a helicoptor, or plane. after dropping my gm off, i drove quickly back to the site to see if it was still there and it was, so i parked my car for about 5 min watching and waiting. i turned my lights off cause at the time i figured they could see me watching. i watched it bounce all the way down the street and the it came back,shortly after a real plain came passing by, very smooth and slow,wings, and windows very visible to me, the ufo was about 50 feet above the plain, i dont know how they did not see this event, after the plain passed it the bounced in the air, down the street and back , after realizing what i seen i quickly went home and told my parents
content.summary: I watch a very bright light  hover in the air, moving up & down, left & right, shortly after i seen a real plane, and it went by very visibly.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo. actually my camera saw it because at the moment of shot i didn`t see it with my own eyes.I took this shot with my nokia n95 phone which has decent camera on it. it couldn`t be a bird because birds appear to small and somethimes not at all when i shot them with my phone. shape of the ufo in my opinion couldn`t be a plane eather because there are no planes of that shape. when i enlarged the photo and adjusted contrast on the image i noticed that it is symmetrical in shape but distorted on one side, i think this is because it was moving it one direction. but i think it`s speed was not so fast because shutter on n95 phones is not so fast. i have found on the internet that people shot ufo-s on cameras that have sensors sensitive to infrared light, i tested my phone camera and it is sensitive to infrared also.
content.summary: Ufo serbia.

content.detailedDescription: I am a former "force reconnaissance" marine and currently a security contractor in iraq.  a little over a year ago, i had some pictures taken of me on an abrams tank.  i brought all of the pictures that i had taken on that tour back home to show my wife.  as i was going through the pictures at home, i noticed that there was an object above my head in the tank picture.  it was white and was a perfect triangle.  i have no idea how high it was, due to the fact that i have no idea how large the object was, so i could not estimate distance and size.  the only think that i can say in reference to size and distance, is that the object was about half the size of my head, up in the sky.  also, there were three pictures taken while i was on the tank and in every picture, the object was in the same position in each picture.  anyways, i analyzed the picture and it was no glitch in the camera at all.  the camera was a "new" pentax optio v20 8.0 megapixel. now, i know every single aircraft in this ao up here in northern iraq, and absolutely nothing is even remotely close to the shape of the object on the picture.  there are, of course some weird looking uav's up here and none of them look like that object in any way.  this was a perfect, white triangle.  there were no fuzzy apparitions in the picture, etc....  also, take in mind, my background that i stated in the first sentence.  one of my specialties is reconnaissance and surveillance.  i have made a living off of observation.  now, of course this really pisses me off, but i spoke with my wife about the picture the next day and she made fun of me about the picture, so i brought her up to the computer to show her.  i am not lying, but all of my pictures that i had during my last time in iraq were missing off of my computer!!!  i am not crazy or lying in any way.  i am at a loss of words on how that could of happened.  i have no idea.  i am pretty sure no one "snuck" into my house and deleted them, but who knows.  i am not going to delete them though.  on top of that, i am a skeptic about the whole ufo situation and personally think that almost everyone that claims to have seen a ufo is some "hick" or a person that has had an uneventful life and needs something interesting to keep themselves going through life.  i have had a very eventful life and "been there, done that".  i don't need something interesting to keep me going.  i know what i saw and it was nothing that the us or any other country in this world has for aircraft...At least as far as i know, but if we had an aircraft that looked like that out here, i would know about it.  now, one of my friends who was also there taking pics is currently recovering from battlefield injuries in the states.  when he recovers and comes back, i will try to see if he has the pic on his computer that i can get, to send you.  i am pretty sure he also took a pic with his camera when i was on the abrams tank.  if he does have it, then i will have proof that i was not seeing things or am crazy.
content.summary: White "perfect" triangle above my head in picture.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second report.
tuesday, dec. 23, 2008, 9:55 p.M.-
observed object earlier in the evening, as i came home from the grocery store in cisco.  as i drove home headed sw on hwy 206, a bright object was located in the sw, approx. 60 degrees above horizon, near where venus would be.  however, there was a dark bank of high clouds above and behind the object, so venus was not visible until well after i got home at 6:50 p.M..  i was soon briefly able to see both venus and the object, then lower clouds moved in and both venus and the object disappeared.  i called my husband who is 45 miles north of me and he could see it too, though he could not make out what it looked like.  to me, i could see 3 lights blinking together, on and off. total viewing time of first sighting: 25 minutes.
later that evening at 9:55 p.M., i took my dogs outside and the object was again observed at approx. 80 degrees above horizon, due south.  in 3 hours it had moved to the east.  i could make out 3 distinct white lights together in a horizontal position.  the object had 3 lights that seemed to flash together, with a brighter or lesser degree of intensity.   the object was static and i observed it long enough to snap one picture, then the object blinked out to total darkness and was gone, yet i could still see the stars that were behind the object at the time.  a few minutes later, clouds moved across that area of sky and i gave up searching. total time of observation for the second sighting was about 3 minutes.
i am located approximately 50 miles east of dyess afb, and approx. 95 miles west of air force plant 4 (formerly carswell afb).
i noticed that the photo from my first report did not upload, so i will try again.  the 1st photo shows the object i witnessed on dec. 21, 2008 and the 2nd photo is for dec. 23, 2008
content.summary: 3 lights below dark clouds, then moved east and i took picture before it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were coming home from a date to troutman n.C. around 11:30 pm. as we rounded a curve heading toward her home you can see out over a large area of sky. i noticed this ring of 7 lights, each light was equal distance from each other in a circle. it was odd enough that it caught my eye as no normal. i pointed it out to my date and she also saw the object. when we arrived at her house the object was still above us and we got out of the car and stood and looked at it. as we watched it did a very strange thing. the seven individual lights in a ring separated and went out in every direction. it is like if you think of a compass one light went south, one, southwest, one west, one northwest, one north and so on. they went in straight lines and one came straight over our heads. we watched, there was no sound, no blinking, nothing like an airplane. it just went straight at a constant speed. each one went out from the ring at a constant speed in all different directions. i don't know what it was, never had seen anything like it before or since. my wife and i talk about this sighting often and we both still remember it in detail 30 years later. have never told this story to anyone offical, just a few friends. my wife agrees with all the above statements.
content.summary: Circle of 7 individual white lights at approx. 3 to 5 thousand feet then lights separate and go in 7 different directions, no sound, no blinking

content.detailedDescription:
I have already sent this report to steve hudgeons of mufon in texas.  i am reporting it here, for your records.
on sunday, dec. 21, 2008 at approximately 3:43 a.M., i took my dogs outside, in the back yard of our farm house, and as i am always looking at the sky, i saw an object ssw of my location.  it was 60 degrees above the horizon, at an elevation of at least 5,000 ft. (my best guess). it was probably somewhere over, or just south of the small town of cross plains.  the object was blinking white and red lights in rapid succession. there was also a hint of green color.  at first i thought it was simply a brilliant star, or venus but that observation changed.  i carry my digital camera with me, just in case.  i snapped several photos but only one came out. i apparently snapped the photos when the object would momentarily go dark.  however, as you can see by the one image i managed to capture, that the object is clearly discernible.  to the naked eye, the object was elongated, like a disk or triangle.  the craft(?) stayed in the same spot in the sky for the 20 minutes i viewed it, then it vanished into the fast moving clouds, though it momentarily lit up a cloud as it was enveloped. the object made no noise.  as for how i felt, well, as long as they are "up there" and not chasing me into the house like one did last month, i felt fine, still do.
i also have another sighting and photograph from last night, dec. 23, which i will send in another report.
content.summary: Star-like at first, blinking white and red lights in rapid succession, then saw elongation.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed an object approx my size, with more mass, approaching from the north.  i am flying a b-757-200 las-jfk redeye. national airlines las-jfk. due to the moonlit night was able to observe from approach. 45 degree approach, 10 miles behind, slow accelleration to abeam wing, 600kts g/s flying formation for about 1 minute, observed windows,other features of a/c,the flying large wedge then accellerated slowly to about 1/2 mile ahead of me and made a 90 degree to the right, followed by a 90 degree to the left pitched up 60 to 90 degrees and dissappeared.  i was awaiting the wash there was no wash no prop, no jet, no nothing! the a/c evaporated.
co-pilot wanted to make a report to den center of unreported trafick. i said i will do it, den center, do you have trafick in our area?)  (no, youre the only ones out there tonite) !!!!!!
i state this as fact an can produce the f/o

[cms/tg - witness name and identification moved to witness summary box]
content.summary: While flying b-757-200 @fl 410.

content.detailedDescription:
at approximately 5:55am while having a conversation on the phone in my room with my window facing west, i looked up and out the window to see an orange light gently coasting along. at first it appeared to be a solitary star or planet. however, the sky was overcast and the object was clearly visable, closer to me than the ceiling of clouds which were at the moment producing a very light rain. the object was to the west of my residence at an est. alt. of 8-12 thousand feet, depending on its distance which was hard to judge do to the unknown size. the only factor which helped to aid in range estimation was the cloud cover. i would estimate the distance from myself to the object at appx. five thousand meters, it's position was about 50 degrees above the horizon relative my position.

 the object moved at a slow and waivering pace, sometimes cruising along with very noticable movement, and at other times coming to an appearant stop, then once again moving along. durring the sighting no other objects were visable in the sky. the sighting lasted appx. 5 minutes. durring that time, the object moved from south to north, covering an estimated distance of 1.5 miles before making a gentle bank and gaining in altitude while heading west by north west. throughout the time i had the object under observation its appearance altered continuously, but remained recognisably similar. its brightness and realative size increased and decreased in pulsing fashion, yet no pattern of frequency of the rate in which it did this was noticed. at one point it apeared to seperate into two joined spheres momentarily, before merging together again. upon fusing back together it gained brightness and appeared to possibly drip a little bit, as if molten metal were collecting at its underside. yet at no time did i observe any potion of the object seperate fully from itself.

 after heading north for appx 3 and a half minutes it slowly gained altitude and began to shroud itself in the cloud layer while banking left to head west. its brightness dimmed i can only assume due to obscuration. i continued to track the object for a little over another minute as it was intermittantly lost in the clouds until it finally disappeared all together. the object made no sound that i could hear, and had it been a passenger aircraft, which i had observed many times at that appx. range and alt. i would have been able to hear engine noise. had it been a civilian aircraft at all it would have had some variant of marking lights, all of which were absent. it was definately not the landing lights of an aircraft either. it appeared much as a flame would in its flickering glow. it was not a military jet becuase it moved to slow, also no noise. it was not a planet or star becuase it was below the cloud cover and moving. it was not a comet or meteor becuase its movements were eratic, changing direction, and gaining altitude.
 
 i cannot for any purposes identify it as something i am familiar with as a trained observer having spent over 7 years in the military and having the ability to identify numerous types of aircraft both civilian and military, as well as pyrotecnichs. also i have a sound fundamental understanding of astronomy and weather phenomenon.This event happened on dec. 24 2008 between 0555hrs and 0600hrs.
content.summary: Orange flickering ball of light observed changing brightness and shape in pre-dawn sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking over a bridge in denver co i took a picture the sky.  i have no memory of anything unusual or of seeing an object in the sky. it was only after i returned home to montreal that in examining the picture there appears to be an object partly obscured by a cloud.  i am unable to identify it but it does not look like a conventional aircraft. a blimp?

[cms/tg/pid]
mcgill university
content.summary: Ufo discovered in photo of denver sky

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
((my directions may be inaccurate, i'm using google maps and they don't have a compass for some.. really weird reason.))

i was on my way to lichtenberger park in elk grove for my evening exercise, traveling by bike like i do every day. i left my house around 5pm, and immediately noticed an unusually large number of planes in the sky. i didn't think too much of them, as many looked like commercial flights and cessna's with the exception of a much larger, gray plane. 

(every now and then, myself and others have encountered similar very large planes but at very low altitudes slowly going over our neighborhoods and parks during daylight hours. though these were strange sightings and presumably military in nature, we have not thought much about it although we do wonder where the base is and why they are traveling as low as a redwood's height over our suburb)

as i reached the end of my neighborhood and approached main roads, i noticed a strange helicopter. it was big, dark, and had two blades on the top of it. it was heading nw, and i lost track of it in the houses. i continued east through kloss park, and it was becoming dusk. when i reached litchtenberger, heading south, i was noticing something huge in the sky, bigger than any other other craft i'd seen that day. i couldn't get a good look through the oak trees, but it had two lights on top of it, and was not shaped like a jet or plane. i rushed through the park until i got to the end of it, trying to get a better look, but i had lost it in the rooftops and trees.

i then sat down on a swing, facing east, intently watching the sky for another sighting. it didn't take long before i saw the craft again. at first, its size made me think that the two lights belonged to separate craft, but they were most definitely part of the single ufo. it was heading east, southeast towards franklin high school, and moving pretty slow. i continued to keep my eyes on it, and rushed down the streets trying to keep up with it. it had a round underside, and the two lights seemed like they were mounted at the top of two points on the upperside of the craft, and could be compared to a ch-47d from what i've seen, but i doubt that is what i saw (though i didn't see the blades, i assume it had one over each light). the two lights were level, or very close to level with each other. the ufo appeared to be descending, as though it would land in the field on the corner of bruceville and elk grove blvd. unfortunately, i lost it behind the rite aid and nugget market so i quickly returned to the swing i had sat at. i was relieved to find that i could still watch it. my friend a called me then, and i told him what i was seeing. i ended the conversation quickly.

i don't remember hearing any sounds. i was also beginning to notice the number of other planes in the sky when i saw something else. it was getting pretty dark by now. to my right were two white/yellow lights, typical plane lights. but one of them disappeared as it moved down through a transparent cirrus cloud, it disappeared. the cloud did not seem thick enough to hide a plane's glow, as the night sky and even stars were visible through it. this light "returned" on the opposite side of the other light it had been with, only were it had been closer to and under it, it was now above and further apart from it. this light did nothing more, and continued heading north, northwest. i could barely make out a shape, but it looked like it was a jet.

however, the light it was with begun acting strangely. it had been very slowly going up, slightly to the right while its partner had been gone before. now, it suddenly dropped down very, very, very quickly. it was almost as though it was teleporting, and i felt my heart sink because i thought i was witnessing a very weird crash, but in fast motion. then it continued heading north, northwest(i think it did other irregular things, but i can't recall with full certainty. may have also turned due west). i looked towards the larger ufo again to check on it, and it was still in my sights but had made substantial distance and appeared to be landing since it was  still descending. my guess would have been somewhere near franklin high school, especially considering that the land out there becomes vacant fields and farmland.

i returned home sometime around 6:12pm, to go with my family to my sister's band performance at the middle school, and i continued to see many aircraft, presumably cessna's, on the way there. when the performance ended at 8pm, air traffic seemed to be reduced to normal levels. (0-2 crafts)

i am planning to return to the park and make a sketch of where i saw the lights of the ufo. i know this area very well, and marked which trees it was nearest to. i hope to have some sketches ready, but at the moment i don't have a scanner accessible.
content.summary: Many aircraft in all directions, large one at very low altitude. smaller ones moving very irregularly, including disappearing/reappearing, and sudden, sharp, fast movements.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was triangular in nature..Hollow in the middle and very large. it hard lights round it and it was just gliding. we were three witnesses thast saw it and it was a very exihilrating event. my girlfriend looked up and said guys isn't that a shooting star? so me and my buddy looked up and then we just saw the triangluar object gliding so low. there was no noise for how low and huge it was. we had goosebumps and we were all screaming wtf is that. it was like a 10 second view..It glided above us and i tried to tape it but it was too short of a view. we were in lethbridge alberta canada on my balcony cause my roof has a balcony on it. if my girlfriend hadn't said that we should look at the shooting star we probably wouldnt have seen it..It was silent..Just gliding and it looked hugeeee...Ufos are real people
content.summary: It was a triangular and hollow in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: I set the camra at night to find out who is cutting the light i was watching the camra to see if anyone was out side that night when i saw the thing coming out of the sky on my camra you have to see it to belive it
content.summary: It come from sky to the ground then there was a light that come to my door when it come down you can see a face in it i have a tape of it .

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:58pm in northern san juan capistrano area.  a clear night, 52 degress.  overlooking the hills from north san juan towards dana point.  i saw a silent object about a mile south hovering over beyond a hill with red and blue lights.  could not make out the shape.  but it was silent.  it had a spot light like a helicopter.  but it was swaying the spot light around in circles slowly.  going clockwise, then counter clockwise, clockwise then counter again.  the spotlight was so bright that it illuminated the entire hill.  for about a minute.  but no noise from the object.  it seemed like very unusal activity for a helicopter if it was one.  but then again, it was silent.
content.summary: Silent hovering object with swaying spotlight.

content.detailedDescription: It was the day before opening deer season. i had brought a girl along with my family because had never went camping. we were outside waiting for the camp fire to go out. my girlfriend said "what the hell is that?" i looked up and said it's probably an airplane. she said no it's not. i grabbed a a pair of binocaluers and walked toward the direction of the light. i scoped in on it. it was an sphere of orange light with a red light rotating around the middle of it. (there was also a near full moon seeing was not a problem) the red light made three rotations, on the third rotation it split into two seprate lights, same size. i asked my gf did you see that? airplanes don't do that. she started freaking tell me to come back into camp. i got closer to her to make her feel better. then we saw it. a third light literally came out of thin air. you saw a twinkle of white light then bam it would turn into an orange sphere. they flew in purposeful patterns, then disappeared behind some hills. i went into our trailer and had my husband come out. maybe two minutes went by and two of them came back, twinkle then bam. my husband told us not to be too loud he did not want the kids to worry. he went back insidew/kids. i grabbed a flashlight. my gf asked me what i was doing. i told her i was going to see if they would communicate. she freaked no don't do that. i did it anyway. two more showed up after i started flashing the light. we went back inside the trailer. the next night i, with my oldest daughter took my gf home. eight fourtyfive we headed back up the pass towards ellensburg. my daughter said mom are those the lights you and marina were talking about. they were back. they showed up again the next night. then nothing til several days later. we were at my girlfriends house in yakima visiting on the 22nd. we were on her front porch. it was 6:30ish. i looked up and saw the damn light again. i looked at my girlfriend and she said "you see it too?" i told her "is this thing following us?" she said "your the fool who tried to talk to them." i haven't seen them since. i am thinking it's point of origin was around the yakima firing range (military base). my gf said military aircraft doesn't split in half, i agree. i believe they are not of this earth.
content.summary: Ball of orange light w/red light circling in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: A friend alerted me to a strange white light in the southern sky as we smoked a cigarette outside. we live in tallahassee right near i-10 and my house is on one of the highest hills in the city. as i turned to look, the object vasillatted back and forth and instantly shot up to a way higher altitude. remaining at that same altitude it sped away while zig zagging at the same time. the rate of speed and the abrupt change in speed and direction was extraordinary.It had only one light that would dim to yellow. the light just became a pin point of light as it sped away we both pretty much knew what we were looking at! we are both lucid and wide awake. wow. that kind of technology wont be around for some time to come and it is srtiking when you finally see it.
content.summary: Strange light moves quickly away to higher altitude then zig zags at ridiculous speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed in the dark with my curtains open but as i got up and gazed out the window, i saw the whole sky flash a bright blue. it was only there for a second or so. but it was similar to the way that meteor made the sky turn bright in the canada incident. i know that on a different occasion i saw some electric blue object bolt for a cloud before, and it was so high up in the sky, yet it's light was so potent that i noticed it from thousands of miles below. i don't know that this could have been the same object but whatever was so strong that it made the whole sky turn very bright in a flash. i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Powerful flash turned all sky bright blue for a flash second.
